attributes.action: reduce the working week from 5 days to 4 thereby making a 3 day weekend.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
What more can I say. Vote now before they make it a metric week!
You know them weeks that we have a bank holiday in, they are marvelous. the 4 days shoots over. Not to vote is just wrong.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
